messages.body:
Dear Hansen ,I am Bennard Egoabia Ekpontu, a solicitor at law. I am the
personal attorney to Mr. Mark Hansen a national of your country, who used to
work with Shell Petroleum Development Company (SPDC) in Nigeria. Here in
after shall be referred to as my client. On the 21st of April 1999, my
client, his wife and their three children were involved in a car accident
along Sagbama express road. All occupants of the vehicle unfortunately lost
their lives. Since then I have made several enquiries to your embassy to
locate any of my clientÕs extended relatives. After these several
unsuccessful attempts, I decided to track his last name over the Internet,
to locate any member of his family hence I contacted you. I have contacted
you to assist in repatriating the money and property left behind by my
client before they get confiscated or declared unserviceable by the bank
where this huge deposits were lodged. Particularly, the finance compan!

y where the deceased had an account valued at about USD$7.95 million dollars
has issued me a notice to provide the next of kin or have the account
confiscated within the next few weeks. Since I have been unsuccessful in
locating the relatives for over 2 years now I seek your consent to present
you as the next of kin of the deceased since you have the same last name so
that the proceeds of this account valued at USD7.95 million dollars can be
paid to you and then you and me can share the money in the following ration:
60% to me and 40% to you. I have all necessary legal documents that can be
used to back up any claim we may make. All I require is your honest
cooperation to enable us see this deal through. I guarantee that this will
be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any
breach of the law. Please get in touch with me by my email and send to me
your telephone and fax numbers to enable us discuss further on this
transactionA

E Best regards, Barrister Bennard Egoabia Ekpontu

bennard egoabia ekpontu

On the 21st of April 1999, my client, his wife and their three children were involved in a car accident along Sagbama express road. All occupants of the vehicle unfortunately lost their lives. Since then I have made several enquiries to your embassy to locate any of my clientÕs extended relatives. After these several unsuccessful attempts, I decided to track his last name over the Internet, to locate any member of his family hence I contacted you. I have contacted you to assist in repatriating the money and property left behind by my client before they get confiscated or declared unserviceable by the bank where this huge deposits were lodged. Particularly, the finance compan!

y where the deceased had an account valued at about USD$7.95 million dollars has issued me a notice to provide the next of kin or have the account confiscated within the next few weeks. Since I have been unsuccessful in locating the relatives for over 2 years now I seek your consent to present you as the next of kin of the deceased since you have the same last name so that the proceeds of this account valued at USD7.95 million dollars can be paid to you and then you and me can share the money in the following ration: 60% to me and 40% to you. I have all necessary legal documents that can be used to back up any claim we may make. All I require is your honest cooperation to enable us see this deal through. I guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law. Please get in touch with me by my email and send to me your telephone and fax numbers to enable us discuss further on this transactionA

E Best regards, Barrister Bennard Egoabia Ekpontu

messages.body:
Greetings, Mr. Ekpontu (If I may call you that).

 

I am quite interested in your proposal, however, as you know how things are
over the internet, I am slightly curious over your sincerity.  

 

I personally feel the best way for me to validate your legitimacy is to
contact the spirits.  I seek guidance in them whenever I am unsure of
something, you understand.

 

My astrologer told me that today will be a very lucky day, as he
specifically said "something good will happen".  He was very specific, as
you see, and something good did happen, so I'm guessing this is the real
deal!

 

Please, reply to this message so I can confirm I am actually in
correspondence with a real person and not some computer program, and I'll
get back to you with what the spirits tell me.

 

-Lord Kenneth McGee, Esquire
messages.raw:
lord kenneth mcgee

Please, reply to this message so I can confirm I am actually in correspondence with a real person and not some computer program, and I'll get back to you with what the spirits tell me.

messages.body:
Greetings Mr. Ekpontu (if I may call you that).

 

After consulting the spirits I'm a little confused.  When I asked them if
your offer was legitimate I saw a visions of goats.  I clearly don't know
what they are trying to tell me, so I ignored them and contacted my
spiritual guide, "Grandfather Randi".  He chided my skepticism and told me
to hold out would be an insult to the great people of Nigeria.

 

However, my astrologer told me that Venus is in my 5th house and the cow
jumped over the moon, which means that all business dealings must wait a few
days.

 

I must say, money is not something unfamiliar to me.  My success on the
stock market (partial thanks to my astrologer and Grandfather Randi!) has
left me rich, so while more money would be nice I would be affected little
by it.  But I will take you up on your offer eventually, for all the good
people of Nigeria.

 

Yours in waiting,

 

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esquire
messages.raw:
lord kenneth mcgee

Greetings Mr. Ekpontu (if I may call you that).

After consulting the spirits I'm a little confused. When I asked them if your offer was legitimate I saw a visions of goats. I clearly don't know what they are trying to tell me, so I ignored them and contacted my spiritual guide, "Grandfather Randi". He chided my skepticism and told me to hold out would be an insult to the great people of Nigeria.

However, my astrologer told me that Venus is in my 5th house and the cow jumped over the moon, which means that all business dealings must wait a few days.

I must say, money is not something unfamiliar to me. My success on the stock market (partial thanks to my astrologer and Grandfather Randi!) has left me rich, so while more money would be nice I would be affected little by it. But I will take you up on your offer eventually, for all the good people of Nigeria.

Yours in waiting,

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esquire

messages.body:
Dear Lord Kenneth,

 

 

Thank you so much for your response to my proposal. Like was mentioned in my

proposal, the modalities for a successful transaction have been taken care

of. All that is required of you, is your maximum cooperation and

confidentiality. Please do not entertain any fear whatsoever, since I am in

a position as a practicing attorney to know my limitations within the law of

my country. I cannot for any reason involve myself in any dealings that will

jeopardize my reputation.

The late Mark Miller and his wife do not have any known relative. This I

have been able to verify and as such we do not have any problem as far as

that is concerned. All that is required of you is your maximum cooperation

and confidentiality in this matter.

 

I will, however, ask that you give me your word of promise that you will not

take undue advantage of the trust I am bestowing on you to run away with the

fund.

As a first step towards actualizing this transaction, you have to send to

me by fax, your full details and identity to enable me start the processes

involved. In the meantime you are to fill the following 'application of

claims' and send to me by fax so that I can submit it to the appropriate

department.

 

From this point I will require your maximum cooperation because once I put

in an application of claims on your behalf, you are automatically recognized

as the true beneficiary.

For your assistance, you will be getting 30%of the total sum, while the

remaining 65% is for me while 5% is set aside for any incidental expense

during the course of this transaction. I intend to invest at least 50% of my

share in any business that is profitable in your country, with your kind and

valuable advice.

If there is anything which you do not understand ,please do not hesitate to

ask me for more explanation.

I look forward to your urgent reply so that we can proceed with this

transaction immediately. In the meantime PLEASE keep this transaction

STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL so as not to compromise the security of this funds.

 

Thank you and best regards,

 

Benard Kobaki

 


 

 

 

Following is an 'Application of Claims' format that you are to fill and sign

and send back to me by fax to enable me submit this on your behalf for us.

 


"APPLICATION OF CLAIMS"

 

The executive Director,

Office of the Director, Legal/Documentary Credit Dept.

UNION NIGERIA PLC, Headquarters Annex

Victoria Island, Lagos Ð Nigeria

 

Dear Sir,

APPLICATION FOR CLAIM AS ÒNEXT-OF-KINÓ DRAWING FROM

ACCOUNT OF LATE ENGR. MARK WITH YOU.AMOUNT:

US$7.95,BILL NO. UBNCL/1/7289/98

First of all, I do hereby request to maintain that you know about me, who I

am. I am the next of kin following my blood relationship with Late Engr.

Mark.

With this letter, you will certainly remember that some years ago, many

daily newspapers in your country published the death of one of your numerous

clients,Engr. Mark who had a permanent resident permit in Nigeria since

1978, and who died in a car.Following the deposit/lodgement holden in the

domicilliary account of your late customer, Engr.Mark and Bill No.

UBNCL/1/7289/98.I have realised the mentioned bill according to the deed of

will being interpreted for and in my favour by his attorney and at the date

of this letter, I have not received any payment from you yet.

I trust you will understand that in these circumstances therefore, I will be

pleased to receive as soon as possible this payment in accordance with the

below referred account and bill duly established and I request you to

transfer the above outstanding deposit into my account as follows:

 

Bank Name ÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉ.

Bank Address ÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉ.

Bank Tel/Fax/Telex ÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉ

Bank Code ÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉ..

Account No. ÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉÉ

 

I am prepared and ready to submit or surrender any Documentary evidence(s)

on demand and also, I would be solely responsible for all obligations

thereto.

Kindly treat this application with urgency it requires.

Thank you.

 

 

j

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Benard Kobaki:

 

What happened to my good friend Ekpontu Adiebuonu?  I was in correspondence
with him over an issue relating to a "Mark Hansen", not this Mark Miller.  I
understand some mix-ups do happen, as law offices as prestige as yours often
are.  But, what about Ekpontu?  Was he a victim of some rogue voodoo magic? 
I'll be pissed if he was turned into a zombie.

 

If my good friend Ekpontu is ill, I know of many homeopathic cures which
will fix him up in a jiffy.  They don't have any of that icky chemical taste
 either-- they go down easily, just like drinking water!

 

As you can see from this mixup, it always is good to check the stars for
guidance in this area.  

 

-Lord Kenneth McGee, Esquire

lord kenneth mcgee

-Lord Kenneth McGee, Esquire

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Ekpontu:

 

I apologize for this minor inconvenience, but I don't own a telephone.  You
might find this strange or funny, but just bear with me and you'll agree
with me that it is wise for me not to own one...

 

You see, I fear demonic spirits are after me (hence why this ritual needs to
go underway).  I am afraid if I use the telephone demons will shoot out of
the earpiece and into my brain, taking over my soul and giving the aliens
another chance to abduct me.

 

My astrologer disagrees, but not Grandfather Randi.  It's hard who to
believe, but I have to go with Grandfather Randi because the picture of
himself he gave me is a picture of his face surrounded by an aura.  My
astrologer's picture doesn't have that effect.

 

 

Yours in The Ritual,

 

 

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esquire

Yours in The Ritual,

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esquire

messages.body:
Dear Ekpontu:

 

Telepathy is the psychic ability to communicate by thought.

 

Now that I think about it, communicating through telepathy isn't a good idea
 it requires two well-trained minds and I am not very experienced.  The best
I've been able to do is mentally communicate with my dog, trying to tell him
why one does not defecate in the house.  Dogs are silly creatures, all he
wanted me to do was go out and by a nice juicy steak.  Also, it might leave
me open for the evil spirits to possess me, again, and I hate it when that
happens.

 

 

Yours in Thought,

 

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esq.

lord kenneth mcgee

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esq.

messages.body:
Greetings, Ekpontu:

 

I see we are finally getting down to business-- the meat and bones of the
deal.  I pray by the Goddess that everything goes well, and no evil spirits
interfere.  I have been told by Grandfather Randi that evil spirits are well
known for interfering in business deals stemming from Nigeria, and frankly,
I'm not suprised.

 

I require a reagent from you to make sure this business deal goes smoothly. 
Can you take a photograph of yourself holding a sign or piece of paper that
says "Ekpontu" on it, and send it to me?  I need this for the
beforementioned ritual-- a ritual involving the photographs of both business
partners to ensure no interference with dark energies or evil spirits.

 

After the ritual we can get these business dealing underway safely and
securely.

 

Yours in The Ritual, 

 

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esq.

lord kenneth mcgee

I need this for the beforementioned ritual-- a ritual involving the photographs of both business partners to ensure no interference with dark energies or evil spirits.

After the ritual we can get these business dealing underway safely and securely.

Yours in The Ritual,

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esq.

messages.body:
Greetings Good Friend Ekpontu:

 

 

I am quite dismayed at your lack of dedication to this business deal,
Ekpontu.  I was told by the Goddess herself to from this ritual.

 

If the ritual does not go underway then the business deal cannot go through,
and certain doom may even befall you.  I will try to seek out the advice of
Grandfather Randi once again and see if he can find another way.  In the
meantime, I need the ingredients.

 

 

Yours in The Goddess' Warmth,

 

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esq.
messages.raw:
lord kenneth mcgee

Yours in The Goddess' Warmth,

Lord Kenneth McGee, Esq.
